Bacterial_spot.name: Bacterial spot
Bacterial_spot.description: Small dark lesions on leaves and fruits; leaves may turn yellow and drop.
Bacterial_spot.suggestion: Use copper-based bactericides; practice crop rotation; remove infected plants.

Early_blight.name: Early blight
Early_blight.description: Dark concentric spots on older leaves, eventually causing defoliation.
Early_blight.suggestion: Apply fungicides like chlorothalonil; remove infected debris; rotate crops.

Late_blight.name: Late blight
Late_blight.description: Water-soaked lesions turning brown and leathery on leaves and fruits.
Late_blight.suggestion: Use fungicides like mancozeb or metalaxyl; avoid overhead irrigation.

Leaf_Mold.name: Leaf Mold
Leaf_Mold.description: Yellow spots on upper leaf surface with olive green mold below.
Leaf_Mold.suggestion: Ensure good ventilation; use resistant varieties and fungicides.

Septoria_leaf_spot.name: Septoria leaf spot
Septoria_leaf_spot.description: Numerous small, circular lesions with dark brown margins and gray centers.
Septoria_leaf_spot.suggestion: Use disease-free seeds; apply fungicides; remove affected leaves.

Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_mite.name: Spider mites
Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_mite.description: Speckled leaves, webbing, and leaf bronzing due to mite feeding.
Spider_mites_Two_spotted_spider_mite.suggestion: Spray miticides or neem oil; maintain humidity; use predatory mites.

_Target_Spot.name: Target Spot
_Target_Spot.description: Brown spots with concentric rings on leaves and fruit.
_Target_Spot.suggestion: Use fungicides; improve air circulation; avoid overhead watering.

_Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.name: Tomato YellowLeaf Curl Virus
_Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.description: Leaf curling, yellowing, and plant stunting.
_Tomato_YellowLeaf__Curl_Virus.suggestion: Use resistant varieties; control whiteflies; apply reflective mulches.

_Tomato_mosaic_virus.name: Tomato mosaic virus
_Tomato_mosaic_virus.reason: Virus transmitted by tools, hands, and infected seeds
_Tomato_mosaic_virus.description: Mottled, curled leaves and stunted growth.
_Tomato_mosaic_virus.suggestion: Use virus-free seeds; disinfect tools; avoid tobacco use when handling plants.

healthy.suggestion: Continue regular monitoring and good agricultural practices.

_bell___Bacterial_spot.suggestion: Use disease-free seeds; apply copper-based sprays; control weeds and avoid overhead irrigation.
